div.br:
Please read the COVID-19 Meal Program Letter for full details.
Pickup schedule:
Monday and Thursdays from 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. through the end of the school year.
Please note that pickup days will have meals for multiple days of the week.

Iron Mountain, MI 49801

div.strong:
OUR MISSION STATEMENT
The Iron Mountain Public School District in partnership with students, parents, and community ensures that all students:
Develop the ability to think and learn independently as well as cooperatively.
Develop values of self-discipline and form a strong sense of personal responsibility and respect for others.
Develop a foundation in which they are equipped with the knowledge, skills, and confidence to shape and respond to the future as life long learners.

a.span: When to keep your child home
